RelatedSentence: While Fools should generally take the opinion of Wall Street with a grain of salt , it 's not a bad idea to take a look at particularly stock - shaking analyst upgrades and downgrades -- just in case their reasoning behind the call makes sense .

While Fools should generally take the opinion of Wall Street with a grain of salt , it 's not a bad idea to take a look at particularly stock - shaking analyst upgrades and downgrades -- just in case their reasoning behind the call makes sense .
What : Shares of China Mobile  ( NYSE : CHL     ) gained about 2 % today after Goldman Sachs upgraded the Chinese telecom giant from neutral to conviction buy .
So what : Along with the two - notch upgrade , analyst Donald Lu planted a price target of $ 61 on the stock , representing about 23 % worth of upside to Friday 's close .
So what : Along with the two - notch upgrade , analyst Donald Lu planted a price target of $ 61 on the stock , representing about 23 % worth of upside to Friday 's close .

So while contrarian traders might be turned off by China Mobile 's price strength in recent weeks , Lu 's call could reflect a sense on Wall Street that tailwinds from rapid LTE adoption give the company plenty of room to run .
